title: Sound On: Taiwan Fires Warning Shots at Drones
itunes:title: Sound On: Taiwan Fires Warning Shots at Drones
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Joe speaks with Professor Jacques deLisle about Taiwanese soldiers firing shots to ward off civilian drones flying close to islands controlled by Taipei near China. Plus, our politics panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Bill McGinley, former-White House Cabinet secretary, discuss international threat from China and Russia and President Biden's trips to Pennsylvania.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
